title: PES scholarship doubt
content: This is regarding kcet fees which is around 1.08 lakhs + 22k + 11k(i heard it increased this year) assuming total is 1.4 lakh, if we get mrd or cnr scholarship is it 40% or 50% of 1.4lakh or is anything not included in the scholarship. Plus i think i saw people say we get the scholarship semesterwise, how does that work since we pay yearly?
